result.adr_address: Hong Kong Convention And Exhibition Centre, 1 Harbour Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong Convention And Exhibition Centre, 1 Harbour Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: Congress Plus

reviews.text: It was a great stay and I felt like nothing was missing. The serving was always there, refilled the water, asked for wine or coffee and fulfilled any wishes I had. I also got fries especially made for me! That's a perfect restaurant. I enjoyed the stay and can only suggest anyone to go there.

Very good lunch buffet at the Convention  Centre with a good view. usually have quite a good spread for the buffet with many hot and cold dish offerings. The service of the waiters is also very good. Above average buffet offered and quality is always consistent.

ln my opinion, one of the better lunch buffets available on offer.
The food is not bad but the price is liitle bit high. If it is not a departmental event, I will not pay ~$600 for that.

I've been to this restaurant a couple of times with family and friends for dinner buffets. The view is spectacular. The food quality and service are top-notched. Always make sure to make a reservation in advance.
Was there for the express lunch buffet. Is somewhat expensive for what you get /selection is mediocre. Better than other restaurants at the expo however

result.vicinity: Hong Kong Convention And Exhibition Centre, 1 Harbour Road, Wan Chai

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, 灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心1樓
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心1樓
result.name: New Shanghai

reviews.text: Very good Shanghainese food and is easily the best restaurant at the convention center. Whenever I'm here for a show I come at least once. Service is not very good though, the waiters tend to have a bit of an attitude that I don't see at the other restaurants at the convention center. Definitely avoid sitting behind the bar (see my photo) because the waiters don't often look over there so service is extra bad! But definitely go for the food as you'll have to go much further to get anything better in the area.
Fast, good service, delicious food, good priced.

On December 7, 2018, I was quite desperate to get a lunch reservation on the same date to entertain VVIPs from near and far at the Convention & Exhibition Centre. Then I remembered my friend Maurice’s recommendation of the very convenient and accessible restaurant here and asked the receptionist Nikki to facilitate. She was really customer-friendly and managed to arrange a nice table for us at short notice so that my VVIP friends and I could have a quick window of opportunity to reconnect and sustain the relationship！
Try the Dumplings Xiao Long Bao.
Service was bad, but food was nice and quick

result.vicinity: 灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心1樓

result.adr_address: 香港灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心1樓
result.formatted_address: 香港灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心1樓
result.name: 新滬坊

reviews.text: 地方，食品及服務都好的，唯是飲茶就很低劣，當天叫了壽眉，真是只有色味道全無每位收2O元茗茶太離譜了！收貴但都要物有所值的！👎

Very good Shanghainese food and is easily the best restaurant at the convention center. Whenever I'm here for a show I come at least once. Service is not very good though, the waiters tend to have a bit of an attitude that I don't see at the other restaurants at the convention center. Definitely avoid sitting behind the bar (see my photo) because the waiters don't often look over there so service is extra bad! But definitely go for the food as you'll have to go much further to get anything better in the area.
Fast, good service, delicious food, good priced.
サービスも味も大満足のお店。何を食べても美味しい。

Good food, good vibes, friendly staff. 15% off food bill with HSBC Platinum credit card too if food cost is over $600. 我們吃了馬蘭頭百頁，水煮羊，蟹肉豆腐，腰果露和椰汁奶凍。好味道! 唯一就是蟹肉豆腐的汁牛油味道有點重，不太合我口味。不過是用心做的，連伴碟也很有心機，是用好靚的食用花! 腰果露亦好好味，好濃的腰果味道。茶亦很有水準，茶葉不錯。座位很闊落舒適，樓底很高，不太嘈吵，檯和檯之間亦有足夠的空間不會周邊的人說什麼都聽到。

I also got fries especially made for me! That's a perfect restaurant. I enjoyed the stay and can only suggest anyone to go there.

Very good lunch buffet at the Convention  Centre with a good view. usually have quite a good spread for the buffet with many hot and cold dish offerings. The service of the waiters is also very good. Above average buffet offered and quality is always consistent.

ln my opinion, one of the better lunch buffets available on offer.
The food is not bad but the price is liitle bit high. If it is not a departmental event, I will not pay ~$600 for that.

I've been to this restaurant a couple of times with family and friends for dinner buffets. The view is spectacular. The food quality and service are top-notched. Always make sure to make a reservation in advance.
Was there for the express lunch buffet. Is somewhat expensive for what you get /selection is mediocre. Better than other restaurants at the expo however

result.adr_address: 香港灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心
result.formatted_address: 香港灣仔港灣道1號香港會議展覽中心
result.name: 薈景

reviews.text: It was a great stay and I felt like nothing was missing. The serving was always there, refilled the water, asked for wine or coffee and fulfilled any wishes I had. I also got fries especially made for me! That's a perfect restaurant. I enjoyed the stay and can only suggest anyone to go there.

過時過節經常一大家人去食buffet，一係去薈景，一係Grand Hyatt，以前覺得薈景比Grand Hyatt差得遠，但世界輪流轉，今天薈景buffet變得好了很多。

每次都訂了一間大房分兩圍座，但今次卻發現驚喜， 不止食物花款多了許多，整體質素也改善了，中西日印美食包羅萬有，還有燒大蝦，即煮海鮮湯和炒意粉等，廚師即叫即煮，再加上精緻的沙律甜品，美食多得讓人垂涎三尺，目不暇給，再食多百次也不會厭！

食品維持水準，種類不算多，但都是精品。環境闊洛，就算坐滿人客也感覺OK。2018年寫
更新：
8個月後 19年5月。再次光顧。😩😩😩完全不是那樣。平均一年都會光顧一次。但以這次印象失望。飲品都是任飲。但紅酒白酒要另加$80。中菜種類少而品種差。燉湯無供應。燒味種類只得2種。燒鴨望落似乾燒一樣。甜品款式以前都是一般。今次重差。班戟細塊到似由原先一塊剪成20份一樣。蛋糕只得3數欵。還要比人攪到🙈。

Very good lunch buffet at the Convention  Centre with a good view. usually have quite a good spread for the buffet with many hot and cold dish offerings. The service of the waiters is also very good. Above average buffet offered and quality is always consistent.

ln my opinion, one of the better lunch buffets available on offer.
自助晚餐食物質素不錯，地方寛敞。復活節的小丑哥哥扭汽球技巧很高
